table_fmt: IGSDInventory (u_ID BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL UNIQUE PRIMARY KEY, l1_key_count INT UNSIGNED NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, l2_key_count INT UNSIGNED NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, l3_key_count INT UNSIGNED NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, l4_key_count INT UNSIGNED NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, l5_key_count INT UNSIGNED NOT NULL DEFAULT 0)
